name: luminomorphism
description: A UI design system built around light, blur, ambient motion and perceptual feedback.

scripts.start: echo 'Use this as a front-end library via import or CDN.'
scripts.build: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: node -e "require('fs').readdirSync('dist').filter(f => f.endsWith('.css') && !f.endsWith('.min.css')).forEach(f => require('child_process').execSync(`npx csso dist/${f} --output dist/${f.replace('.css', '.min.css')}`))"

author: Victor Mihai
